title: ALLP v1.0 Release
description:
Epic: ActionableLogLines VS Code Extension v1.0

**Goal**: Clickable, queryable log entries with beads integration.

**Scope**:
- Protocol layer (ActionableLogLine, SourceAdapter interfaces)
- BeadsAdapter for parsing beads event format
- QueryInterpreter for command/NL processing
- VS Code extension with WebView panel

**Test Focus**: This epic serves as the test bed for beads/agents workflow validation.
Per-commit metrics will be captured throughout development.

**Success Criteria**:
- All protocol tests passing
- BeadsAdapter handles valid/invalid formats
- Extension activates and displays log panel
- Query commands execute correctly
close_reason: ALLP v1.0 complete: 118 tests passing, full protocol impl, BeadsAdapter, WebView panel, docs. All 8 child tasks closed.
